Bizimana Aboubakar Karume (amụrụ na 7 Disemba, na afo 1989), nke a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya SAT-B, bụ onye Burundian na-edekọ egwu, onye na-agụ egwu, onye edemede egwu, onye egwu, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri. Sat-B bụ onye isi oche nke Empire Avenue, akara njikwa egwu.
A mụrụ Sat-B ma zụlite ya na Bujumbura, Burundi.
